column2: I decided on the 1/2 and 1/2 sandwich option
column3: which I got half pulled pork and chopped brisket. Both were amazingly flavorful and juicy
column4: and had a good amount of fatty juice that made it extra tasty. I also sampled the sliced brisket which is truly a work of art
column5: gleaming pink meat with a beautiful charred black outside.
